body:
Hi everyone,

I have two questions:

1- Does anyone know how do to define the Ashikhman Shirley Radiance material mentioned in this paper

 <font face="Calibri, sans-serif">[http://web.mit.edu/sustainabledesignlab/publications/SpecularGlareP...](http://web.mit.edu/sustainabledesignlab/publications/SpecularGlarePaper.pdf)</font>

<font face="Calibri, sans-serif">2- Where is the HB .rad file located? I prefer to add Radiance materials directly in the .rad file instead of using the add Radiance material component.</font>



<font face="Calibri, sans-serif">Thanks in advance</font>

<font face="Calibri, sans-serif">Rania</font>

Ashikhman Shirley
